Ref: When you provide the logical ID of this resource to the Ref intrinsic function, Ref returns the ARN of the created MSK cluster. For example, arn:aws:kafka:us-east-1:123456789012:cluster/myCluster/abcd1234-abcd-dcba-4321-a1b2abcd9f9f-2.

GetAtt.Description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the MSK cluster.
